Hydras:

"I COMMAND YOU NOT TELL ME QUEEN!!!!!"boomed Hydras"I need that you 
remain here coveren and watch Maximal base... I want to leave a 
trusted soldier to plant a device when times comes"Hydras handled a 
strange disc device"Remember, just when I command you... while 
remain cover, Maximals won't bother you"

And looking to Waspinator and Quicktrike said "Yess unlucky show 
it's over... and we have our own agenda to..." his little speach was 
interrupted when Vykos's message was picked and said "Normally I'll 
answer you when I like"said proudly Hydras"But what are you doing in 
this forgotten part of Universe?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hdyras:
> > 
> > Hidras chucked and said "Battle it's over... and we should come 
back 
> > to base...Inferno... I could hava a little mission to you... are 
you 
> > ready to serve you King?"
> > 
> > 
> "As always, my Queen." Inferno replied saluting Hydras.
> 
> "You meen the blast'in is already done? Dang! Why don't we just 
follow
> them to thier hideout and slag them all?" Quickstrike complained.  
> 
> "Yes! Waspinator no get blown up!" Waspinator cheered taking 
flight. 
> "Waspinator had always got blown up but not this time! Waspinator 
no
> explode! Waspinator be free!"
